page.title: 06BADBURY RINGS
page.content: {(CONTINUED)} at the view.People from all around Sometimes take their dogs for walks.In the middle of the rings there are three large ponds which animals can drink at.In the distance there are a lot of {horse}jumps all over the field,the jumps are made of sticks and branches.In the pond under the water there are different kinds of weed growing on the bottom.{Swooping birds} come down to drink the cool water. {Orchids}grow on the bank of the rings.There used to be a dense wood on the top of the rings,they have now been cut down. The {CUBS and SCOUTS are providing bird houses for the birds and flowers to grow.There are two car parks.Each car park is drawn out on the grass.
